text: QƒÅri', or "reader", is a person who recites the Qur'an with the proper rules of recitation. Although it is encouraged, a reciter (Qari) does not necessarily have to memorise the Qur'an, just to recite it with proper rules. ;Examples: * Qari Abdul Basit * Qari Minshawi These Qaris have memorized the whole Quran. Hafiz means a Muslim who memorized the whole Quran. == References ==
